basics.name: Suraj S
basics.about: I'm a recent BTech graduate in Computer Science, passionate about learning and exploring new technologies. With expertise in Python, Node.js, C++, and JavaScript, I bring robust full-stack development skills along with practical knowledge in cloud computing. My experience as a team leader on various projects has sharpened my communication and organizational skills, and I thrive in collaborative environments that encourage creativity and innovation.

experience.title: Software Engineer - JPMorgan Chase & Co.
experience.description: Conducted market research, consumer needs analysis, and data analysis to create client recommendations
